Directions:

options.option: He was caught in a traffic jam.

Directions:

You will hear a long  conversation and two questions. Choose the best answer from the four choices  marked A., B., C. and D..

element.question_text: Question 1. When will Mr. Smith be back?
Question 2. What message does the man leave?

options.option: Ask Mr. Smith to meet him at the airport.
Tell Mr. Smith the meeting has been cancelled.
Tell Mr. Smith he has left for London.
Ask Mr. Smith to call him.

element.question_text: This is a busy and dangerous road and we need  police there to _____ the traffic.
I could have performed on stage if I had more___.
The plate was so _____ that I was afraid to wash it.
You must be very tired after such a long race, you may _____ my  shoulders.
The___you form here will be with you for the rest of your life.
Halle was very _____, waiting for the doctor at the gate.
He seems quite unable to give up his bad _____.
Soft drink sales in this city have _____ by 8% compared with last  year.
Conversational competence might be the single most ___ skill we fail to teach students
The mountain-climbing _____  to be the most difficult one in our journey.
Freshmen at most universities ________ peer groups because they are completely new to the college environment.
What happens in the first year to a new college student is usually __________ for their future study and life.
His friends helped a lot when he joined the army and failed to _______to care for his parents.
___________between classmates are based on mutual understanding and respect.
Can you help me to _____ a sales plan in that area?
Researchers are worried that youngsters may __________ to socially interact after the overuse of digital devices.
To help her go through the sorrow, he ______ by asking questions about other matters.
I sometimes _____ the new words in the dictionary to find out  their exact meaning.
No sooner had I got to the airport than the plane _____.
_____ writing a letter to the manager, he decided to talk to him  in person.

element.element_text:
Directions:

For each blank there are four choices marked A., B., C. and D.. You should choose the ONE that best fits into the passage.

 

Even kids can have health problems. Some problems are serious and some are not so serious. Do you want to be a healthy kid? Do you (31) _____ how to be a healthy kid? Here are some (32) _____ you should know.

First, eat different foods, especially fruit (33) _____ vegetables. You may have your (34) _____ food, but you should eat something different. If you eat different foods, you can (35) _____ more nutrients (营养) your body needs.

Second, drink water and milk as (36) _____ as possible. When you’re really (37) _____, water is the No. 1 choice. Milk is a great drink that can (38) _____ you more calcium (钙) your body needs to make bones strong.

Third, listen to your body. How do you feel when you are full? When you are eating, notice how your (39) _____ feels and when your stomach feels comfortably full. Eating (40) _____ will not make you feel comfortable.

Follow these rules and you can be a healthy kid.

Directions:

Read the passage followed by some questions or unfinished statements. Choose the best answer from the four choices marked A., B., C. and D..

 

Jenny was worried. She had a job interview, and she wanted to look good. She decided to get some new clothes. The store owner helped Jenny find a suit. But when she left the store, she didn't pay for the suit!

How could Jenny do this? She was in a special store called Career Closet in San Jose, California. Pallas started this nonprofit store to help women. She knew that many women don't find jobs because they don't have the right clothes for a job interview.

Pallas started the store in 1992. Working women donate (捐赠) most of the clothes to the store. This makes it possible for the customers at Career Closet to get clothes for free.

Career Closet has helped 2 500 San Jose women. But clothes aren't the only things women get at the store. They also get confidence. Jenny went to Career Closet and got a jacket, a shirt, and a blouse (短外套). "The whole day made me feel special," she said. Jenny was a success at her interview, and she got the job. One reason she got it was because she was wearing the right clothes for the workplace.

element.question_text: Jenny decided to get some new clothes because she wanted to _____.

options.option: look more beautiful in new clothes
give a good impression at a job interview
wear them for her first day at work
become the owner of the store Career Closet

element.question_text: Pallas' purpose of opening the store is _____.

options.option: to help the poor women with their job interview
to help the working women with their life
to make some profits for women
to provide a workplace for women

element.question_text: Where do most of those free clothes come from?
Apart from clothes, women also can get _____ from the store.
It is indicated in this passage that _____.

options.option: but for Career Closet, Jenny couldn't have got her job
all the customers of Career Closet are working women
dressing properly is very important for job interview
Pallas is a good manager of a women clothing store

element.element_text:
Directions:

Read the passage followed by some questions or unfinished statements. Choose the best answer from the four choices marked A., B., C. and D..

 

About 70 million Americans are trying to lose weight. That is almost 1 out of every 3 people in the United States. Some people are on a diet (饮食). This means they eat less of certain foods, especially fats and sugars. Other people exercise with special equipment, take medicine, or even have operations. Losing weight is hard work, and it can also cost a lot of money. So why so many people in the United States want to lose weight?

Many people in the United States worry about not looking young and pleasant. For many people, looking good means being thin. Other people worry about their health. Many doctors say being overweight (超重) is not healthy. But are Americans really fat? Almost 30 million people in America weight at least 20 percent more than their proper weight. In fact, the United States is the most overweight country in the world.

element.question_text: So many people in the United States overweigh because they _____.

options.option: eat much of fats and sugar

element.question_text: If some people really want to lose their weight, they may _____.

options.option: spend a lot of much money

element.question_text: The purpose of losing weight for some people is _____.
Being overweight appears to be _____.
What can be concluded from the passage?

options.option: Operation is the best way to lose weight.
Being on a diet is a safe way of losing weight.
There is not a sure way of losing weight.
Many people think too much of their looking.
